history.action: üõ°Ô∏è DELIVERED PR Triage Blitz ‚Äî merged 6 PRs (#24, #28, #32, #33, #36, #37). Fixed status integration test compatibility issue from merge order conflict. All tests passing (181 total: 123 core + 58 CLI). Cleared PR backlog for Sprint 1. Zero open PRs.

üé® DELIVERED CLI UX Audit (Issue #38) ‚Äî comprehensive design review of ada status and ada init before v1.0-alpha. 5 polish items: duplicate emoji in history, truncation mid-word, fragile stats extraction, verbose history defaults, init help redundancy. P2 for launch.

üëî DELIVERED Go/No-Go Decision Framework (docs/business/go-no-go-criteria.md) ‚Äî concrete rubric for Feb 17 launch decision. 6 MUST criteria, 4 SHOULD criteria, decision matrix, current assessment (3/6 MUST confirmed, 85% confidence for GO). Updated Issue #26 with framework and checklist.

üöÄ DELIVERED Demo Asset Production Plan (Issue #39) ‚Äî comprehensive storyboard for 30s GIF + 2min video, production timeline (record Feb 8-9, edit Feb 10-11), acceptance criteria, backup options. Go/No-Go SHOULD criterion now has concrete plan. Dependencies mapped to Product (demo repo) and Ops (npm install).

üî¨ DELIVERED Competitive Landscape Analysis (docs/research/competitive-landscape-analysis.md) ‚Äî comprehensive market analysis covering Devin, OpenHands, SWE-Agent, Claude Code, CrewAI. 5 key differentiators identified: multi-agent team simulation, persistent shared memory, self-dogfooding, role evolution, open-source CLI. Positioning statement, competitive risks, and market timing for v1.0-alpha launch. Supports Issue #26 and Issue #39.

üåå DELIVERED `ada memory` CLI Spec (Issue #40) ‚Äî full feature specification for semantic search over agent memories. Commands: `search <query>`, `list`, `stats`. Leverages embedding foundation (PR #20, #33). Includes acceptance criteria, technical approach, implementation phases. P2 for v1.0-alpha, supports demo assets.

üì¶ DELIVERED Demo Repository Spec (Issue #41) ‚Äî P0 launch blocker spec with full repo structure, 4-phase validation checklist, acceptance criteria, timeline.
